page.title: 07STOKE CANON CHAPEL
page.content: The chapel was built early this century. The chapel has quite a lot of meetings. The first meeting of the week is Sunday School at 10.00 am.We have a sing first of all, then we have a quiz. We have a star board and every four stars wins a prize. The attendance is round about fifteen people. The following meeting is at 11.15 am. and we take bread and wine. It finishes at 12.30 pm. The attendance of that is about 20. We come back to the chapel at 6.30 pm. and a speaker comes and speaks to us and it ends at 7.30 pm. The attendance is about 40. After, we have a meeting called after meeting. It finishes at 9.30 pm. We have a few other meetings as well.
